 The th Grader with Yellow Shirt and Brown Pants is a  student who first appears on the  episode  He is generally used as a background character   His only major role was in his debut episode  where he and the other  promise to defend  fromif they bring a photo of s boobs The boys then bring the photo which was actually a photo of s ass and the th graders try to fight Trent but end up failing   Not much is known about his personality It can be assumed that he behaves the same as the other th graders like spending time bullying younger children Like the other th graders he is also not very smart as he thought the photo the boys brought was really a photo of s breasts   He is a tall th grader with dirty blond hair with a strange hairstyle and wears a yellow longsleeved shirt brown pantsHe along with the other th graders seeing a fake photo of s breasts      Debut   Seen at the school assembly   Seen in the Gymnasium   Seen in a photograph on the wall of  bedroom   Seen in a photograph on the wall of Heidis bedroom
